snippet: Sandy Alderson, the Mets' general manager, has turned to Twitter to satirize the growing hoopla around the organization's shaky finances.
abstract: Sandy Alderson, the Mets' general manager, has turned to Twitter to satirize the growing hoopla around the organization's shaky finances.

headline.main: Alderson Gets Funny About the Mets' Money
headline.print_headline: Alderson Gets Funny About the Mets’ Money
